channel.title: Attention players
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Attention players" - Heaven village is recruiting

item.title: Attention players
item.content:encoded:
Hi everyone i am Belzhebu kage of Heaven
i am recruiting players of all season to make the village grow
so hopefully we enter NRF soon, and entice too
so don't wait anymore join us:
Heaven Village

Saludos!
